Ok, now I GTG. Goodnight everyone.

::Slayer::

Slayer sighed, a few shots hitting him in the back. He whirls out of 
the way of the heat-seeking missiles, destroying them as they circled 
back to get him. He felt a strong blast hit his back, but his armor 
was holding.

"Its no use," he says to Ignatis over the comm, "There're hordes of 
the maintenance bots. Lets get out of here. Don't return to base, 
give them a nice chase till they lay off."
